titleStmt.title: Bank of Kentucky Branch at Hopkinsville

availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

org.orgName: Bank of Kentucky Branch at Hopkinsville

body.p: Branch of the Second Bank of Kentucky headquartered in Hopkinsville, Kentucky. President(s): John A. Steele, J.P. Campbell. Cashier (s): Reuben Rowland, Isaac H. Caldwell, James A. Wallace.

ab.bibl:
John S. Gillig, "Bank of Kentucky" in The Encyclopedia of Louisville ed. John Kleber (Lexington: University Press of Kentucky, 2001), 63-64.
The Merchants' Bankers' Almanac for 1852 (Boston: Phillips, Sampson, & Co., 1852), xxix.
The Merchants' Bankers' Almanac for 1861 (New York: J. Smith Homans, Jr., Office of the Bankers' Magazine, 1861), 28.
The Merchants' Bankers' Almanac for 1864 (New York: J. Smith Homans, Jr., Office of the Bankers' Magazine, 1864), 19.
